package.name: mini_description
package.description:
Description of the Kensiko-Chan Mini model based on the Kobuki_description. Provides the model description of Kobuki for simulation and visualisation. The files in this package are parsed and used by a variety of other components. Most users will not interact directly with this package.
WARNING: This package is disabled because it cannot be catkinized by now, as xacro dependency is not catkin still. In the interim we use a unary pre-catkin stack named kobuki_description.
package.author: demura
